title: Golden epistles contayning varietie of discourse both morall, philosophicall, and diuine: gathered as well out of the remaynder of Gueuaraes workes, as other authors, Latine, French, and Italian. By Geffray Fenton.
author: Fenton, Geoffrey, Sir, 1539?-1608.
publisher: By Henry Middelton, for Rafe Newbery, dwelling in Fleetestreat a litle aboue the Conduit,
